title: Ticket #6025: Improve my_popen(v) error messages
description:
Trying to diagnose a user's problem; they get this error message: 

  my_popenv: Failed to exec in child, errno=2 (No such file or directory)

It would sure be useful if the error message included the arguments to my_popenv, so we knew what it was trying to exec...
creator: wenger
